name: Wayne and Plane Flight Instruction
about: At Wayne and Plane Flight Instruction, we are dedicated to providing the safest and finest pilot training in Southeast Michigan. Our experienced instructors offer personalized and comprehensive flight training programs tailored to meet the individual needs of each student. With a focus on excellence, we ensure that our students receive top-notch instruction in well-maintained aircraft. Our commitment to safety, coupled with a supportive learning environment, makes us the ideal choice for those aspiring to become pilots. Whether you are pursuing a private pilot license or advancing your aviation career, we are here to guide you every step of the way. Join us at Wayne and Plane Flight Instruction to embark on your aviation journey with confidence and professionalism.
services:

Intro Flight
